data.title: The Official Home of DC
data.meta_description: DC.com - Welcome to the Official Site for DC. DC is home to the world's Greatest Super Heroes, including SUPERMAN, BATMAN, WONDER WOMAN, GREEN LANTERN, THE FLASH, AQUAMAN and more

THE WOMEN SHINE IN

WATCHMEN CHAPER 1 – "EXTRANORMAL OPERATIVES"

A visit between one-time teammates Rorschach, Doctor Manhattan and Silk Spectre falls apart quickly in this exclusive Watchmen Chapter 1 clip. Faithfully adapting the acclaimed graphic novel, Watchmen Chapter 1 is now available on digital.

GET TO KNOW

POISON IVY

What happens when you mix betrayal with an undying passion to save the Earth? You get the Batman’s Floral Femme Fatale.

GET TO KNOW

TIM DRAKE

Tim Drake possesses detective skills comparable to those of his mentor Batman, though his heart may be his greatest weapon.

GET TO KNOW

JACKSON HYDE

Jackson Hyde may have been taught by Aquaman himself, but the looming threat of his father, Black Manta, is never far from his mind.

GET TO KNOW

MIDNIGHTER

Midnighter’s life is shrouded in mystery. His name, family and childhood life are an enigma, even to him.
